titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that Congress should devote resources to researching treatment options for women with ovarian cancer and support community groups that promote awareness about the disease and encourage early diagnosis.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 9/10/2003--Introduced. Expresses the sense of Congress that Congress should continue to devote resources to researching treatment options for women with ovarian cancer, and support community groups that promote awareness about the disease.
